snippet: In the records from its last policy meeting, the Federal Reserve signaled that it would probably begin a new bond-buying program in December to try to spur job growth.
abstract: Minutes from Federal Reserve's most recent policy meeting signal it will probably begin a new bond-buying program in December to try to spur job growth.
lead_paragraph: In the records from its last policy meeting, the Federal Reserve signaled that it would probably begin a new bond-buying program in December to try to spur job growth.

headline.seo: Fed Minutes Show Interest in Extending Bond-Buying
headline.main: Fed Minutes Show Interest in Extending Bond-Buying Effort
headline.print_headline: Fed Minutes Show Interest in Extending Bond-Buying Effort
